title: Fan fiction, RIFT from a champion's POV

embed.description: Thick pancake batter blooped from the spoon and sizzled into a generous amount of butter on the hot pan. “Ohh this is going to be a good one” Ashe said to her visitor who sat perched at the kitchen table.

body:
I've never written fan-fiction before, but now there's a contest I thought I might try it out. If anyone's interested I'd love some feedback, if not then sorry for wasting your time ^__^

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/contest-fan-fiction/yRENiE12-pancake-day

friendlyFerret
